businessInfo.name: GrowSphere
businessInfo.tagline: Crafting digital experiences that captivate and convert
businessInfo.description: We specialize in creating modern, responsive websites for small to medium businesses. Our focus is on delivering beautiful designs that drive results and help your business grow online.

services.title: Custom Website Development
services.description: Tailored web solutions built from scratch to meet your unique business needs

services.title: E-commerce Solutions
services.description: Complete online store setup with payment processing and inventory management

services.title: Business Website Package
services.description: Professional websites for small to medium businesses with essential features

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.message: GrowSphere transformed our online presence completely. The website is beautiful, fast, and our membership inquiries have increased by 300%!

testimonials.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.message: Outstanding work! The e-commerce platform they built for us is user-friendly and has significantly boosted our online sales.

testimonials.name: Dr. Meera Patel
testimonials.message: Professional, reliable, and delivered exactly what we needed. The patient portal has streamlined our appointment process beautifully.

projects.title: EcoShop - Sustainable E-commerce
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform specializing in eco-friendly and sustainable products. Features include advanced filtering, carbon footprint tracking, and sustainability scoring for each product.

projects.title: FitTrack Pro - Fitness Companion
projects.description: An advanced fitness tracking application that combines workout logging, nutrition planning, and social features. Users can set goals, track progress, and connect with fitness communities.

projects.title: Revibe - Mental Wellness Hub
projects.description: A comprehensive mental health platform offering daily affirmations, mood tracking, guided meditations, and personalized wellness plans to promote overall mental well-being.

projects.title: FoodieConnect - Restaurant Discovery
projects.description: Social dining platform that helps users discover local restaurants, share reviews, make reservations, and connect with fellow food enthusiasts in their area.

projects.title: HealthHub - Telemedicine Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive telehealth solution connecting patients with healthcare providers through secure video consultations, prescription management, and health record tracking.

seo.title: GrowSphere Studios - Custom Website Development for Small Businesses
seo.description: Professional website development services for gyms, schools, restaurants, and small businesses. Modern, responsive designs that drive results.
